        private final int floorNumber

    • Constructor Detail

      • Floor

        Floor​(int floorNumber)
        A Floor object can be instantiated simply using a floor number. A Floor object only has a purpose, if a Building holds a reference to it.
        Parameters:
        floorNumber - The floor number of the Floor within a Building

    • Method Detail

      • getPassengers

        java.util.List<Passenger> getPassengers​(int spotsLeft,
                                        Floor destinationFloor)
        This function is used by the elevator to ask for passengers. Only a specific number of passengers which want to go in direction to the destination floor can enter.
        Parameters:
        spotsLeft - The number of passengers, which can be handed over to the elevator
        destinationFloor - The next destination of the elevator
        Returns:
        A list of passengers given to the elevator for transportation

      • getPassengers

        java.util.List<Passenger> getPassengers​(int spotsLeft)
        An empty elevator has no destination. Any passengers going in the same direction can be given to the elevator for transportation.
        Parameters:
        spotsLeft - The capacity of the elevator
        Returns:
        A list of passengers given to the elevator for transportation

      • enter

        void enter​(Passenger passenger)
        This functions simulates a passenger leaving the elevator on this floor using System.out.println This function is only called by the passenger itself.
        Parameters:
        passenger - A passenger leaving an elevator on this floor

      • leave

        void leave​(Passenger passenger)
        This functions simulates a passenger entering the elevator from this floor using System.out.println Before entering the elevator, the passenger is removed from the waiting queue on this floor This function is only called by the passenger itself.
        Parameters:
        passenger - A passenger entering an elevator from this floor

      • addPassenger

        boolean addPassenger​(Passenger passenger)
        Passengers can be added to the waiting queue on this floor
        Parameters:
        passenger - The passenger which will be waiting for the elevator on this floor
        Returns:
        Success of adding them to the waiting queue

      • getNumberOfWaitingPassengers

        public int getNumberOfWaitingPassengers()
        Get the number of passengers waiting for the elevator to pick them up
        Returns:
        The number of passengers in the queue

      • hasWaitingPassengers

        public boolean hasWaitingPassengers()
        Check whether passengers are waiting on this floor
        Returns:
        At least 1 passenger is waiting for an elevator

      • getFloorNumber

        public int getFloorNumber()
        Getter of the floor number
        Returns:
        The floor number of this floor

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Floor floor)
        Two floors are compared, based on their floor numbers.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Floor>
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor this floor should be compare with
        Returns:
        The comparison between this floor number and the other one
